articles.author: Michael Erman,Carl O'donnell
articles.title: U.S. approval of COVID-19 shots could boost vaccination numbers, Fauci says - Reuters
articles.description: Top U.S. infectious disease expert Dr. Anthony Fauci said on Friday he hopes regulators could as soon as next month start granting full approval for the use of COVID-19 vaccines, a move he said could spur unvaccinated Americans to get the shots.
articles.content: July 30 (Reuters) - Top U.S. infectious disease expert Dr. Anthony Fauci said on Friday he hopes regulators could as soon as next month start granting full approval for the use of COVID-19 vaccines, … [+3163 chars]
